name: Raichu
flavorText:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

previous.name: Pikachu
previous.flavorText:
When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.

next.name: Sandshrew
next.flavorText:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

pokemon.name: Pichu
pokemon.flavorText:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.
pokemon.formDescription: Spiky-eared Pichu can only be received by taking the shiny Pichu from an official promotion to celebi's shrine in ilex forest.  Spiky-eared Pichu is always female, cannot evolve, cannot be taken into the Wi-Fi Club or the Union Room, and cannot be transferred to Generation V, but is otherwise a normal Pichu.

pokemon.name: Pikachu

When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.
